They’re my new favorite dancing shoes and they have loops to allow the laces to actually hold them in place while you’re really cutting the rug. Heck by the time you engage the ribbons of destiny the rug should have been burned to a crisp 😉. Really comfy, flexible but not sloppy/floppy or sock eaters. Great for walking too; I just got the music in my soul and I can’t even walk boring 🎭. If you don’t remember anything else I write here never forget this next bit. I give these barefoot shoes a five star rating because they are comfortable and was able to walk a good 3 or 4 mile walk in them and never bothered my feet one bit and didn't feel no scraping against the skin and plenty of toe space and feels really light on your feet and would recommend this product to everyone to also likes barefoot shoes also I might buy another pair as a spare

First time buying barefoot shoes comfortable

The size and colors in the listing are accurate. It's a solid option for a barefoot shoe. However, there are some seams on the inside of the shoe that you can feel even with a sock on, if you choose to wear a sock, that aren't the most comfortable. Also of note is that I found I was mildly allergic to whatever the lining is made of, though I don't know who else would ever experience that. If I wear socks it's fine but if I try to wear these barefoot it's no bueno.  The bottom of the shoe is also weirdly sticky, sort of like an old school bounce-ball you'd get out of a vending machine, and within a few minutes of walking through my house I was sliding around from all the dog hair stuck to my shoe. This is probably a plan C for me that I'll keep on hand for mowing the lawn but probably won't wear regularly due to the interior seams and weird sole.
Great buy! Comfortable and durable

Bunions and an arthritis bone spur - "regular" footwear HURTS! And forget any kind of dress shoe. I guess I have resigned myself to "old lady shoes" - but these actually don't look too bad with certain skirts and even a few of my dresses. Since the style is now clunky boots with everything, these look MUCH better IMO. The mesh does not rub or give my pain or blisters and my toes have plenty of room to wiggle. It's too bad children aren't put in these kind of shoes from day one - it would likely save them a world of hurt later in life to allow their feet to grow normally, unrestricted, and not deformed.
This is my second pair, but not the same brand as my first.  These are more comfortable and better made than the first pair I bought.  Well worth the price.

Wow. Very impressed. These shoes are good-looking, very comfortable, and fit my son's rather enormous size 13 Sasquatch feet ;) like a glove. He was very pleased with this new shoes, and will likely order the color he initially picked out as soon as it's back in stock. Recommend!

Overall these are decent for a sub $25 price point. The toe box is a good size! The sole is thin and flexible like one would like for a barefoot style shoe.  However, the way the rubber around the heel is molded severely restricts the flex I am wanting in a barefoot shoe.  Best I can tell these are a zero drop but with the heel issues they lean a bit away from a true barefoot shoe.

I have very bad hammer toed feet and a lot of shoes are uncomfortable to wear for very long. I had never heard of big toe box shoes before and when I came upon an ad for them I thought why not give them a try. I bought a pair of less expensive ones to see if they helped. They did, so I started looking for a pair that I could wear with dress pants and came across these Scurtains.  They looked nice but were out of my size so I checked back every day and in less than a month they were back in stock. I'm glad I waited. These look great with dress or casual pants and the best thing is they feel wonderful on my feet. I highly recommend this shoes.

Sooooo comfortable and look the same! If you like walking around barefoot than these are perfect! Only they have enough sole to protect your feet from any rocks though still feel like my feet are free!

I’ve tried a few barefoot shoes and these are my favorite. They’re a little more rigid than some brands I’ve tried, which I prefer at this point because I am just starting this barefoot thing. My favorite part is that the tow box is wider than other shoes I’ve tried, and the shape of the toe makes it look like an actual shoe, not a water shoe. I have bunions and my big toe sits up pretty high. When wearing the style that outlines your toes on the front the fabric was tight on my toes, like it would rip off the rubber easily. And it was plain uncomfortable.  All that said, these are my favorite & I will be suggesting them to friends & buying again!

Good quality and good fit. Decent appearance, back is a bit plastic looking. So far they perform well, easy to put on. No stability issues.  They are not as breathable and therefore warmer as other barefoot shoes I have worn.  Overall good value.

The color and style were very nice. The shoe quality is superb, the material used is light and breathable and most of all the fit is sturdy which was more than I’d expected for that price. I was very satisfied.

Wow. You really can't beat these at this price point. Barefoot shoes are stupid expensive. These are not. I have three pair of barefoot shoes including these, and these are my favorites. Highly recommended.

These are my new, everyday, around the house, run errand shoes. Comfortable and lightweight. I love the big toe box and zero heel height. My left foot swells. Leather shoes are either too tight on the left or too large on the right. The knitted tops give a good feel t on both feet.

I am 5’10, and wear size 11 shoe for women. I bought the size 9 for men in black. I got these for my morning walks. Love them. Wide, almost weightless, and very flexible. The pain in my feet after my walks is almost none existent after wearing these puppies. Breathable fabric makes them super uncomfortable and a joy to wear, now I have to get them in white!

They fit as expected. Very comfortable. I wouldn't say they cured any foot pain, but they are probably better than regular shoes.

These shoes fit me like a glove and are very comfortable. I’ll be honest, I removed the laces and cut off the eyelets because they really didn’t serve any purpose for me, just made it harder to get them on and off. All in all, I’m pretty pleased.

I love these shoes, I bought two more pair after wearing them. But the heel is too thin and not enough support for walking. I walk two miles a day and these don't cut it. For just everyday around the house they get 5 stars. They should not be called walking shoes.

I have stage 4 autoimmune RA. Feet deformed with severe hammer toe. Looking for super wide shoes to fit my feet. Thought this one looked promising. Not enough room for my issues, not enough stretch. They would be fabulous if you have normal feet. Sturdy, flexible, does have stretch (not enough for me) easy use, be good for walking off trail, I’d wear in water. Cute shoes for normal wide feet.

These are advertised as MEN'S shoes. I'm a 42 y/o mom. I typically wear an 8 or 8.5 in women's, depending on the brand. I purchased a 7.5 wide & they feel just as though I'm wearing my crocs. They are roomy! It will take some time to get used to the zero drop--but these are super cute! As soon as I got them in, I ordered my 21 y/o son a pair! These are at a great price point to try them out. I'm thinking about ordering other colors for myself.  Weight: they are quite light Stability: I feel flat footed, grounded. Durability: time will tell, but they do seem like they are of pretty good quality.
I drive my heels when I walk. These shoes would have been PERFECT if they had just a LITTLE MORE heel support!
Coming up on 2 months of gym use and they are holding up very well. Comfortable and functional.

评论概述: Very comfortable for my wide foot
评论详情: I wear a size nine, but when ordering shoes on-line, that isn't always the size I should have ordered. In this case, the supplier has an accurate sizing chart. The length is perfect, but more importantly, the width is perfect for my wide foot. They are very comfortable to walk in and they are lightweight. They are also breathable, allowing them to stay cool in the hot summer heat of the south. A good value for the money.
They fit perfect.  It was a great value for the price

I love these barefoot shoes for their convenience; see, despite having laces, they are designed as slip-ons, making them effortless to wear and remove. They are soft, quite comfortable, and great for home wear. Their original insoles were a bit thin for me, so by adding an extra pair of insoles I had on hand, the shoes are now super comfortable. These shoes are lightweight and don't leave my feet feeling tired or sweaty, even after wearing them for several hours, unlike other sneakers I own. Overall, I love these shoes for their comfort, lightness, and the security they provide while walking, thanks to their non-slip rubber outsole design. I recommend them.

评论详情: Be aware of the size difference. I bought a size 12, which I normally take. This is a size 45 overseas and the sneaker was too short in length by about a half of size. I returned them and bought a 12.5, which worked fine.

These inexpensive shoes are very comfortable.  Best barefoot type shoes for my neuropathy.

These shoes are really different from sneakers, running shoes, etc.  I am a 60+ woman...I feel more balanced and stable in these shoes because they are closer to the ground than sneakers...balance is a big issue when you're older. They are really comfortable...the wider toe box is fabulous...I can still wear my custom orthotics and socks in them and everything fits, and they are not tight anywhere...perfect!  Buying more colors.

评论概述: These shoes are not zero drop
评论详情: I bought these hoping for a barefoot shoe experience. I wore them with the insole taken out. The heel is noticeably raised and you can feel the pattern of the outsole pushing up under the heel as well. Disappointing since they otherwise look good (with some serious Vivo vibes)

Edit: I reordered a US 10 men’s and they fit perfectly. I removed the laces because they really are not necessary. I will be ordering other colors.  I wear a US 9 men’s/11 womens. My toes rubbed against the end of the shoe before I put my foot down on the floor. The rubbing worsened when I walked.

Love the style, fit and comfort. I'm a women's size 9 1/2 ww so I ordered a men's 8 1/2 w and they fit perfectly!  It's so nice to have wiggle room for my toes! I also got a pair in white and am seriously thinking of getting a third pair since the price is so reasonable.

This is my first pair of barefoot shoes and I am hooked. I ended up getting a half size smaller and they fit perfect. The width is great and I have a bunch of wiggle room with my toes. The shoes have laces but you can lighting tie them and just slip the shoes on and off. I liked the sole looking like a foot and toes and it has amazing grip on multiple surfaces. The soles are nice and thing and very flexible. It definitely feels like walking almost barefoot. I like these so much I already ordered a second pair in another color.

I bought the white and within 48 hours, I was ordering the navy, black, gray and tan.  I wear a women's 9.5, wide. I ordered size 10 and it fit like I want it to. I think had I gotten a 9, my toe would've been right in the tip of the shoe. The ten leaves me about a thumbs space between my big toe and the tip of the shoe.  While still more of a sneaker than shoe, it's not so sneaker looking that it looks weird with business casual wear.  Not a lot of cushion, but there's not supposed to be in a barefoot shoe, though the mildly cushioned insole keeps it from feeling like you're pounding on cement when doing daily walking or standing. Not sure how they'd fare doing heavy duty walking, personally, my footfall is too heavy and the terrain is such that I've yet to find a barefoot shoe good for that level of impact.  The laces are functional though I didn't need to tighten mine.  Plenty of room for foot splay. This is a true wide shoe. If you don't actually wear wide width, you'll probably find your foot moves around in it too much. I worried the toe box being so wide, that they'd look like flippers but they don't look like Ronald McDonald's feet when I look down and others have complimented them so I guess they don't look weird to others either.  Comfortable with and without socks.  Appear to be machine washable though I haven't attempted cleaning them yet.  Great price, I'm coming back for the remaining three colors.
I have very wide feet and these are perfect. Look good too. Delivery was quick. They are very comfortable.
Great shoes for Herman Munster feet like mine. I love walking in these. They are very comfortable.

评论概述: Pretty comfortable lightweight walking shoes with extra wide toe area
评论详情: I usually wear sneakers or running shoes when I walk or use my exercise bike but sometimes they get irritating after a while. I wanted to get some lightweight shoes and something a bit more comfortable, so when I came across these I thought they looked awesome. I love that the toe is wider instead of becoming more narrow like most shoes are. I placed an order for them and they arrived very quickly. Now, first let me say that these aren’t a high priced shoe so don’t expect them to be made extremely well. But, they are still pretty good quality All things considered. They look pretty nice, the fabric seems durable enough and the soles are pretty thick to where thet should definitely have some longevity to them. But Actually, my favorite feature of these is how wide the front toe part is! Usually, when I am walking a lot or using my exercise bike, my toes get crunched up in. They’re always really sore by the end of my session. With these, it is extra wide, and even though they look a little bit funny, they feel absolutely amazing. Definitely a game changer and something I am really, really happy about. The price point is actually really great For what you get so I can very confidently recommend these to you as a pretty solid purchase. I hope my review helps you to make a more well informed decision.

These shoes are really comfortable to wear around the house, and my foot feels not only free, but protected as well.  The shoes breathe rather easy and my foot feels cool when walking, and even though I have had a history of plantar fasciitis I have no difficulty with these shoes, as they support my arch perfectly, and my wide foot has plenty of room, not feeling restricted at all!

This is a pair of men's walking shoes in wide width. The sole is very grippy and the top of the shoe is elastic and conforms to your foot. There is an added shoelace across the top to tighten down if you feel like it might slip off. I got these for my husband and he enjoys wearing them walking around the neighborhood. It is much better than his flip-flops and it is comfortable. The inner soul does come out and he did replace it with a more orthopedic version. This is a nice quality men's walking shoe!
Super comfy walking shoes. Excellent for summer time and those who prefer not to be barefoot. Different colors to choose from.

I picked these up for traveling because I needed something light for packing, useful for walking a considerable amount, and versatile enough to match with khakis. On all those counts, these shoes will be more than adequate.  Specifically, I like the wider fit. Although not typically a need for me, feet tend to swell when traveling, and the extra room feels good. The length could have been a half size longer, at least on one shoe, so fit wasn’t exactly true, but not a deal breaker.  Very little structure in this shoe, which is my preference, but may not be suitable for those needing extra support. For me, the closer to bare feet the better, and these do the trick.  The material is synthetic but mostly mesh, so ventilation shouldn’t be a problem. The soles are textured and I have no problem with the traction.  For the price, these offer what I need and a good value.
nice shoe! i like the pattern and color. shoe runs small. order at least half sizse up!
Price at review:  21.99I love these shoes.  They are comfortable, light, and fit so well for my wide feet.  Plus they look great and have a discreet logo.  Plus at this price, it’s a steal.

评论概述: Lightweight, Heel is too flat and doesn't roll
评论详情: I've worn barefoot style shoes for about 15 years. These looked attractive because of the wide toe box and forefoot shape was very similar to my favorite 'Terra Plana Root' shoe (no longer available). I thought the knit looked comfortable and breathable.  I don't really fit wides, but I like the wide toe box. I ordered my normal size (US 10, EU 43) wide. Fit is just about right but the heel isn't tight (as expected). Because the heel is loose I don't feel comfortable wearing them without the laces, it lets my foot slide forward.  I tried them on without the insole. They still have a thin foam pad that is non-removable. The fit was too loose though. I think I might have to order a size down if I wanted to wear them without insoles, and I think the large toe box would make the smaller size still wearable. The insoles themselves are a soft foam, and are a bit thicker in the heel section. Doesn't feel like zero drop to me.  Most of the fabric is non-stretchy except the section around the ankle. I like the fabric look of the toe and forefoot, but the PU leather and side stripes remind me of cheap hi-tops. They looked better in the product photos. The knit is pretty breathable, but just the pattern area at the top of the toes and near the laces. I took a photo with a flashlight inside so you can see where it is open.  Sole rubber is very grippy. I find the heel section a bit too flat and wide. It makes we want to walk with a wider stance as it forces my foot flat early. Would prefer some curve like a normal heel.  The sole doesn't have any external stitches to the upper. I couldn't tell if the stitches inside went through the sole. If it is only glued I worry that it might not hold up in the long term, but that remains to be seen. Their 80k bend test sounds encouraging at least.  The pull-on loops seems solidly attached, and I find pulling them on really easy so they probably won't get stressed anyway.  Shoes are pretty light, around 260g per shoe, with the insole being 15g of that.  All in all, pretty happy. Construction feels above par for this price point. Same for the materials except the PU leather on the heel outer. I'm tempted to go back for a smaller pair that I can slip on without laces.

I like these shoes because of the extra room in the toe area. Very comfortable. I wore them while riding 15 miles on my ebike today and found that the wind can circulate through the toe area which keeps my feet cooler with less sweat buildup. Just the right sole to grip the peddles and that area is comfortable also. Cool looking blues are my favorite color. Easy to put on because the tongue area is stretchy. I found the fit to be right according to the chart in the listing so that the laces are just tied but not necessary to hold the shoes on. Light weight, wide toe, and airy are my most favorite features. $22 is a great price for this comfortable shoes.

评论概述: Really Nice Looking a Comfortable Too
评论详情: These are so comfortable and easy to put while still being secure on my feet. The shoes are attractive as well with cloth and pleather uppers with a funky lacing system. The bottoms of the shoes are even cool with a foot design on the sole.  I took them for a leisurely stroll on my treadmill just to see how the felt while walking and they passed the comfort test with flying colors. That's probably because they have thick cushioned soles and cushioning at the back of the ankle.
Super well made, very comfortable and I love that these came in wide sizes. They fit perfectly!

评论概述: Lace-ups that can be used as slip-ons, with extra toe space
评论详情: This is a pair of wide-toed, stretchy, walking shoes with a low-profile insoles and thick, durable, and rubbery soles. In spite of appearing like slip-ons, they are lace-ups, but once I had tied them securely, I could use them as slip-ons easily enough.  I like that they are comfortable enough to wear around the house and that the extra allotted toe space is more roomy than most walking shoes. That -- along with elastic and breathable fabric uppers -- keeps my feet from sweating too much -- even without socks.  They are a bit more fashion forward than expected, with the design and build providing an interesting and comfortable fashion statement at a decent price point.

评论概述: Super comfy, slightly stylish look, with a little extra wiggle room for your toes.
评论详情: I picked up a pair of the Scurtain Wide Toe Minimalist Barefoot Shoes for Men and decided on the grey fusion color simply because I liked the overall look style wise. I wanted a pair of casual slip on shoes for summer for at the lake or just running around town in. Something easy on and easy off, breathable and comfortable to wear without the need for socks if I choose not to. Comsidering what they are listed at too I was good with them ending up being discarded after putting them to good use for a summer and into fall. I have been really pleased not only with how lightweight they are and give me the extra room I need for my toes but the material feel on my bare feet as well. I don't notice any irritation from the fabric in terms of rubbing against my ankles or the interior of the shoes from the seams or stitching at all. The shoes hug my feet and feel soft inside from when I slip them on until I take them off.  The shoes do have a decent enough insert pad that feels cushy but I wouldn't say it's overly thick and to be honest I don't think there is any if only very minimal at best arch support. So it could be an issue for some guys but probably fixable with better inserts. While the decription of the shoes mentions them being "perfect" for high intensity activities like running, jogging, aerobic exercise and even hiking, I don't think they have the cushioning or proper support required to absorb the impact. I know for the kind of hiking I normally do my feet would be a mess and in bad shape after the miles I'd put on if I wore these lol.  For casual use something that feels like slippers or at just really comfortable they fit the bill whether I'm at the lake, running my errands on the weekends, going on a leisurely bike ride, taking a walk, or even just when I need to run outside quick for something. Fit wise I'd say they are true to size. My big toe doesn't quite reach the end of the shoe.
Decent quality casual shoes. These are wide fit as expected and they look great. My husband did feel the need to add insoles.
للأسف ان البائع احضر حجم مخالف عن الحجم المطلوب ولم يقبل استبداله بالحجم الصحيح
